answers.answer: Eggs and toast is what I had and I hate eggs
I have it to. Is it the glucose test?
I ate toast and failed my 1hr test fasted for the 3ht test only ate ice :/

I did mine at 2:30 pm and I had only eaten a bowl of cereal at around 8 am.  After the test I went to olive garden and pigged out I was so hungry.  I passed mine. I was also only 12 weeks for this one ( high risk so had to test early, will test again around 24-26 weeks)
When you said you had passed it, did you mean like you clear from diabetes?  And they let you know in the same day?
It takes about a week to get back but yes if you pass it you dont have gd
Eat eggs. That's about the only thing you can have that won't screw with your test. Plain eggs and water lots of water
